On Wed, 18 May 2005 12:40:27 -0000, shrikant <ks_shrikant@...>  
wrote:


> All java code are embedded as a scriplet.

If you look back through the archive you'll find some comments about jsps.  
Get rid of the scriptlet. Jsps should not contain any logic - it should be  
in business beans - and therefore shouldn't need testing.

Jim
